title: MAKE MORE YORICK SKINS :)
body: Yorick has been forgotten about and everyone needs to know that the greatest champion in the game still exists!{{champion:83}}

replies.body:
Pretty sure I've mentioned this somewhere before but let's do it again:

Yorick needs a legendary Cooperate skin just like Mundo, where he would be a HR manager of some sort, the Maiden would be that boss who occasionally appears for "serious matters", and the zombies would dress up like white-collar and blue-collar workers who follow orders without question and are raised and thrown to their death.

Or better yet, make Yorick a politician.

Muhuehuehuehue..............
I used to think Cat Lady Yorick was the ultimate Yorick idea but now I am divided :O
Thats the best idea ive heard
I AGREE GOD CHAMPS MUST HAVE MORE THEN 2 SKINS RIOT{{champion:119}}

Yorick has never had a new skin (got 2 on release, as was the custom back then)

Meanwhile Ezreal has had a skin every year since his release. :(

gardener yorick

his ghouls have now been replaced with bees

his q leaves a flower on the ground

his w summons a ring of mushrooms

his e has him throw a clump of dirt

his ult summons a giant wasp.
